title: Redfin, the Online Real Estate Broker, Lays Off 13% of Its Staff
description: The company also said it was shuttering RedfinNow, its home-flipping service, as concerns grow about a slowdown in the housing market.
dc:creator: Isabella Simonetti
media:credit: Deanne Fitzmaurice for The New York Times
media:description: A housing development in Sparks, Nev. The layoffs at Redfin come as high borrowing costs have prompted a slowdown in home sales and construction.
